bug.author: Eric-Zhang1990
bug.summary: [katib] Cannot support PyTorchJob; Please install the CRD and restart studyjob-controller
bug.description:
/kind bug 1„ÄÅwhen I run "kubectl create -f <denchmark-link:https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/katib/master/examples/v1alpha1/pytorchjob-example.yaml>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/katib/master/examples/v1alpha1/pytorchjob-example.yaml</denchmark-link> ", it shows: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24602893/63417145-49ad9680-c433-11e9-9b23-fa049d1b8b06.png></denchmark-link>
2„ÄÅwhen I run kubectl create -f <denchmark-link:https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/katib/master/examples/v1alpha2/pytorchjob-example.yaml>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/katib/master/examples/v1alpha2/pytorchjob-example.yaml</denchmark-link> , it shows: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24602893/63417201-63e77480-c433-11e9-8f0b-f5c029a73991.png></denchmark-link>
Why can't I run offical pytorch example using katib? Can someone give some advices? Thanks in advance. Environment:
Kubeflow version: 0.6.0 Minikube version: Kubernetes version: (use kubectl version): 13.3 OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): cnetos 7
